title: The Nine Hashira
description: Test your knowledge of the elite Demon Slayer pillars!

questions.question: Which Hashira uses Insect Breathing?
questions.explanation: Shinobu Kocho, the Insect Hashira, developed her own Insect Breathing style since she lacks the strength to decapitate demons!

questions.question: Tengen Uzui is known as the Sound Hashira.
questions.explanation: Tengen Uzui, the flamboyant Sound Hashira, uses Sound Breathing and has three wives who are also shinobi!

questions.question: Who is the Stone Hashira?
questions.explanation: Gyomei Himejima is the Stone Hashira and considered the strongest current Hashira. He's also blind and uses a spiked flail and axe!

questions.question: Which Hashira has a snake wrapped around their neck?
questions.explanation: Obanai Iguro, the Serpent Hashira, always has his white snake Kaburamaru with him!

questions.question: Muichiro Tokito became a Hashira only 2 months after picking up a sword.
questions.explanation: Muichiro Tokito, the Mist Hashira, is a prodigy who became a Hashira in just 2 months - the fastest ever!

questions.question: What is Sanemi Shinazugawa's role among the Hashira?
questions.explanation: Sanemi Shinazugawa is the hot-tempered Wind Hashira with a rare blood type that intoxicates demons!

questions.question: Who trained Tanjiro in Water Breathing before he met the Hashira?
questions.explanation: Sakonji Urokodaki, the former Water Hashira, trained both Tanjiro and Giyu Tomioka!

questions.question: Giyu Tomioka believes he shouldn't be called a Hashira because he didn't pass Final Selection properly.
questions.explanation: Giyu survived Final Selection only because his friend Sabito protected him and died in the process, making Giyu feel unworthy.
